the wedding banquet focuses on a gay
landlord who convinces a young female
tenant to enter a marriage of
convenience in order to please his
traditionally minded parents it was
lauded for its open and humorous take on
the especially heavy taboo asian subject
of sexuality star winston chao was

film playing various emperors kings and
on five different occasions chinese
statesman sun yet sen which can all be
traced back to those free acting lessons
provided by ang lee

2004's harold and kumar go to white
castle is a notable blockbuster for many
reasons not the least because it was the
first stoner blockbuster to star two
asian american actors as its leads jon
cho and kal penn only further adding to
the shattering of asian american
stereotypes the characters of harold and
kumar are just regular middle class
americans period the film represents one
of the first times in a comedy that
being asian wasn't the butt of a joke or
played for comic relief the gags
centered around martial arts heavy
accents or sexless nerds that had become
staples in earlier comedies are nowhere
to be found here

a critically acclaimed hit two of its
actors broke academy award history in
2021. steven yan became the first asian
american and the first actor of east
asian descent to be nominated for the
best actor academy award while his
co-star yah jung yoon who plays his
mother-in-law was the first korean
actress in the academy's 93-year history
to win for best supporting actress the
gentle immigrant story about a
korean-american family making it in the
midwest is also the second korean
language film to be nominated for best
picture coming after 2020's winner
parasite along with nomad lands chloe
zhao minati director lee isaac chung's
oscar nomination marks the first time
the academy has recognized two asian
filmmakers for best director
